definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Love is when they gaze into your eyes and it warms your heart.
sentences.chinese: 愛情是當有人凝視你雙眼時你的心窩暖意融融。

sentences.english: A user wants to search for pictures where none of their friends in the image are blinking.
sentences.chinese: 某用戶希望搜索朋友都不在眨眼時攝下的圖片。

sentences.english: THRILL】She was thrilled with delight when the actor winked at her.
sentences.chinese: 當男演員向她眨眼時，他因喜悅而感到興奮。

sentences.english: As you alternate eyes, your finger will seem to change position.
sentences.chinese: 當你輪番睜閉眼時，你的指頭似乎是變換了位置。
